Ladies and gentlemen. Do u think Sgx will toh tomorrow? In my personal opinion  i think it will go down but slightly only. I don‚Äôt think it will be a drastic fall like on 14 May.Here‚Äôs why.- when G first announced phase2HA on 14 May  Sgx fell by more than 2%  and many stocks fell a lot. What happens next is that all these stocks recovered in the next 3 days and many stocks even rallied very quickly thereafter.Everyone should know that whenever market fall nowadays  it will recover just as quick. So the magnitude of fall is never great as many buyers are below waiting to buy in. Hence no crash.- the vaccinated number today compared to 2 months ago are much higher.  G already say if 2/3 population takes the vaccine  many restrictions  will be lifted. I feel this phase 2 HA will be the last time it‚Äôs implemented. More people vaccinated daily. By 18 august  we should have 2/3 population vaccinated.- USA market fell the last 3 days and flushing done yesterday . So tonight and tomorrow morning  USA futures will be green green. Sgx will open around this time when USA futures are green.Your thoughts please
